title: PANTERA & POWER TRIP Announce Openers For European Tour
description: Child Bite and King Parrot, you're up!
author: Greg Kennelty
byline: By Greg Kennelty Published 10 hours ago
excerpt: Child Bite and King Parrot, you're up!
text: Pantera and Power Trip will hit the road together in Europe next January and February, and now they've announced Child Bite and King Parrot as additional support! The tour kicks off on January 21 at the Ice Hall in Helsinki, Finland and wraps up on February 25 at the OVO Wembly Arena on February 25. Get your tickets here. w/ Child Bite 1/21 Helsinki, Finland Ice Hall1/23 Stockholm, Sweden Hovet1/24 Oslo, Norway Spektrum1/26 Copenhagen, Denmark Royal Arena1/28 Amsterdam, Netherlands AFAS Live1/31 Ljubljana, Slovenia Arena Stožice2/1 Ostrava, Czech Republic Ostravar Aréna2/3 Budapest, Hungary Budapest Arena2/4 Kraków, Poland Tauron Arena2/6 Hamburg, Germany Sporthalle w/ King Parrot 2/7 Berlin, Germany Max-Schmeling-Halle2/9 Düsseldorf, Germany Mitsubishi Electric Halle2/10 Brussels, Belgium Forest National2/12 Bologna, Italy Unipol Arena2/13 Zürich, Switzerland Hallenstadion2/15 Paris, France Adidas Arena2/18 Glasgow, UK OVO Hydro2/19 Leeds, UK First Direct Arena2/21 Dublin, Ireland 3Arena2/23 Birmingham, UK Resorts World Arena2/25 London, UK OVO Arena Wembley Want More Metal? html:
Pantera and Power Trip will hit the road together in Europe next January and February, and now they've announced Child Bite and King Parrot as additional support! The tour kicks off on January 21 at the Ice Hall in Helsinki, Finland and wraps up on February 25 at the OVO Wembly Arena on February 25. Get your tickets here.
